channel.title: Comments on: Facebook pages suck, personas are better for marketing

item.title: By: Mynar
item.dc:creator: Mynar
item.description: Found your site on Google. This is a cool post. I'd like to see you take the main idea from this article and cteare another second article, and maybe you could embed a vid, also?
item.content:encoded: Found your site on Google. This is a cool post. I’d like to see you take the main idea from this article and cteare another second article, and maybe you could embed a vid, also?
